Title: A Ilha dos Amores
Writer: Wenceslau De Moraes (memoirs), Sumiko Haneda (dialogue), Tai Jung Kok (dialogue), Luiza Neto Jorge (dialogue), Paulo Rocha, Moriaki Watanabe (dialogue)
Actors: Luís Miguel Cintra, Clara Joana, Zita Duarte, Jorge Silva Melo
Plot: Theatrical drama influenced by the Portuguese medieval poem of the same name, about an island promised to Lusitanian warriors by the Goddess Venus.
